column2: The safe ways were "bushed" by a benevolent Government, and night and day the gay tinkle of the sleigh-bells sounded on it.
column3: The safe ways were "bushed" by a benevolent Government, and night and day the gay tinkle of the sleigh bells sounded on it.

column2: But it's not in the power of my gift.
column3: But it's not in the power of my gift.
